meanings.definition: A small tailless amphibian with a short squat body, moist smooth skin, and very long hind legs for leaping.
meanings.sent1: The pond was filled with colorful frogs hopping around.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of frogs near the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The frogs decided to have a jumping competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as agile as a frog leaping from lily pad to lily pad.
meanings.sent5: The sound of croaking frogs echoed through the night.

meanings.definition: A fastening device consisting of a button and a loop through which it passes.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a frog onto her coat to keep it closed.
meanings.sent2: The frog on his shirt matched the color of his pants.
meanings.sent3: The frog on the jacket seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: The frog on the dress held everything together like magic.
meanings.sent5: The golden frog added a touch of elegance to the outfit.

meanings.definition: A raised or swollen area on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The frog on the wall looked like a small bump.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a frog on her arm after the insect bite.
meanings.sent3: The frog on the map indicated the treasure's location.
meanings.sent4: The frog on the tablecloth made it uneven to write on.
meanings.sent5: The frog on the painting gave it a 3D effect.
